snippet.title: Train Simulator 2019 - OUT NOW
snippet.description:
ESRB Rating: Everyone

Train Simulator 2019 is now available, bringing the latest improvements and content to new players and old! Featuring 180 miles of core routes (plus sidings and yards), 13 different locomotives and 40 scenarios - all alongside the much-anticipated 64-bit upgrade...

Thanks for checking out our videos! There’s tonnes more on our channel, or keep up with the news by following us on the links below:

www.facebook.com/railsimulator
www.twitter.com/railsimulator
www.forums.dovetailgames.com
